items.title: Tested: The Baseus PrimeTrip VR2 Max 240W ends my search for a powerful, reliable car charger [Deal]
items.summary:
It’s true that most modern cars come equipped with a couple of USB ports or even wireless charging pads, but nothing quite matches the convenience of a dedicated charger that plugs into the auxiliary port for fast, reliable power delivery. While Amazon is packed with car chargers of every kind, the Baseus PrimeTrip VR2 Max model, we’re checking out today, stands out from the crowd. This unit not only features multiple ports and connectors to charge up to four devices at once, but it also swivels and rotates for flexible positioning. That means you can easily adjust it to your seating setup for added convenience. I recently took it along on a road trip, and it’s quickly become my go-to car charger. Here’s a closer look at why I believe it’s such a dependable and well-designed pick.

items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Yeedi is offering some serious savings on an array of robot vacuum/mops to upgrade your home cleaning routine. Among the lineup, which you can see in full here, we spotted the brand’s S14 Plus Robot Vacuum and Mop down at $599.99 shipped. This model was released with a $1,400 price tag back in March, but has since come down to a starting $1,200 rate, with discounts having kept the price down at $700 since mid-August. Now, you can score it lower than ever – even beating Prime Day pricing – as it’s getting a 50% markdown to a new all-time low price. For folks not looking to spend so much, there’s also the M12 Pro+ robot back at its lowest $359.99 shipped pricing too. items.title: This Dell 16 Plus touchscreen Copilot+ PC with 16GB RAM/512GB SSD delivers serious value at $600 (Save $350)

We just spotted a deal at Best Buy that drops Dell’s 16 Plus touchscreen Copilot+ PC down to $599.99 shipped. This Intel-powered notebook with 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD typically goes for $950, so you’re looking at a $350 discount on it today. We’ve seen more variants of this laptop get a discount before, but this is the first time we’re tracking a deal on this entry-level 16 Plus model. Today’s deal marks a new best price to beat for this notebook, delivering some serious value today. For comparison, the same laptop with a non-touch display itself is currently going for $1,050 directly at Dell. Head below for more details.
